text: @FLOTUS @farfel54 @USNavy They are going because your husband downplayed Covid-19 for long it has exploded beyond capacity to deal with it and thus the hospital ships are needed in LA and NYC.  The navy is selfless, bless them, but they wouldn't be in the situation if American leadership was better.
